SEARCH
Module help
Package help

Class AddStaffController

java.lang.Object
help.AddStaffController
public class AddStaffController extends Object
Controller for the "Add Staff" functionality in the application. This class handles the input, validation, and submission of staff data to the system. The staff data is then saved either in a database.

      Handles the Cancel button action by closing the dialog window.
      Parameters:
      event - the ActionEvent triggered by clicking the Cancel button

    • setParentController

      public void setParentController(Manager_PersonnelController controller)
      Sets the parent controller to allow interaction between this dialog and the parent view.
      Parameters:
      controller - the parent Manager_PersonnelController

    • handleSave

      private void handleSave()
      Handles the Save button action by validating user inputs and saving the new user. If successful, the dialog is closed, and the parent controller is refreshed.

    • validateInputs

      private boolean validateInputs()
      Validates the inputs provided by the user.
      Returns:
      true if all inputs are valid, false otherwise
